Game.Name: Timmy Time
Game.Plot: Welcome to the nursery with Timmy! Join in the fun with Timmy, Osbourne, Mittens and friends and play lots of entertaining games and activities including: Rock Star Timmy, Go Kart Timmy, Timmy Plays Catch and many more! 3 levels â€“ easy, medium and hard to suit all ages. 14 fantastic games and activities.]Medal reward system to keep children motivated. Encourages the development of memory, logic, problem solving and creative skills.
